td.p: This lecture introduces dynamic programming, and discusses the notions of optimal substructure and overlapping subproblems.

p.em: Image courtesy of aaroninthe360 on Flickr.

html.p: What does it mean for a problem to have optimal substructure?

div.p: A globally optimal solution can be found by combining solutions to local subproblems.

html.p: What does it mean for a problem to have overlapping subproblems?

div.p: An optimal solution involves solving the same problem multiple times.
